Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: One month after starting the antiviral therapy , the patient was admitted to the hospital because he developed rhabdomyolysis .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Rhabdomyolysis |

In this paragraph, the patient developed a specific condition called "rhabdomyolysis" after starting the antiviral therapy. Therefore, "rhabdomyolysis" is the valid disease entity in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Rhabdomyolysis |

In the paragraph, only "rhabdomyolysis" clearly refers to a disease. Other entities such as "antiviral therapy" and "patient" do not directly refer to diseases, but rather contextual information about the patient and treatment.

Note: Rhabdomyolysis is not a chemical entity. It is a medical condition characterized by the breakdown of muscle fibers, releasing muscle contents into the bloodstream.
